long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The KindBuys Extension is a tool that enables conscious consumerism.

When viewing a product on any of our supported retailers, you'll be able to click on the extension and see the environmental and ethical certifications  that product has. When you hover over any of the certifications, you'll see a quick breakdown of what that certification means.

You'll also be able to see what certifications a company has when viewing their website.

Further, when shopping on Amazon, if you view a product without environmental certifications, we try and find more sustainable options for you.

All of these features are quickly expanding to include more products, companies, and retailers.
